26.name: Monolithic

40.name: Homeless
40.base: Win without the Keep token on the board

38.name: Interregnum
38.base: Win having Turmoiled at least 4 times

128.base: {x} while having never added more than 1 card per turn to your Decree

136.name: Pride Parade
136.base: Have at least 2 cards of every suit in the Move column of the Decree

145.base: Finish having never added a suited card to the Recruit, Battle, or Build columns of the Decree

5.base: Have at least 1 of every single item type in your Satchel and/or player board

153.name: Talentless

7.name: The Long Con
7.base: Gain at least {x} points from Flipping Plots

55.base: Have at least 1 of every Plot face-up on the board (Bomb will be temporarily face-up when Flipped)

56.name: Eyes Everywhere
56.base: {x} while having at least 1 warrior in every clearing

58.base: Win without ever Flipping an Extortion

60.notes: For Elite mode, must be played on {Autumn map and Lost City} or {Mountain map}

61.name: Sabotage Complete

61.notes: Has to be from forced placement (e.g., Sawmills, Strongholds)

130.name: Sheer Terror
130.base: Remove {x} enemy pieces with a single Flipped Bomb

116.base: Win without ever moving yourWarlord from its starting clearing

154.base: Finish a game having taken points off of Oppression every single turn

91.name: Nomadic

103.base: Add at least {x} cards to the Retinue

106.base: Recover at least {x} unique types of Relics

124.base: Remove at least 3 enemy pieces from a clearing with a Relic as attacker

14.base: Gain {x} points from Crafting or removing enemy pieces

16.name: Forced Disassembly

109.name: Stingy

159.name: Pacemaker
159.base: Be the first person of the game to reach 12 points

160.name: Refreshing
160.base: Be the first person of the game to trigger the Deck reshuffle

110.name: At the Crossroads
110.base: Rule the clearing(s) with the most paths connected to it

114.name: My Tower

115.name: My City

119.name: My Ferry

120.name: My Market
120.base: Win having swapped a card at the Black Market this turn

121.name: My Treetop
121.base: Win with a building on the Elder Treetop landmark

122.name: My Forge
122.base: Win while having no items left to Craft on the Legendary Forge card

118.name: Bingo!
118.base: You have at least the second highest (or tied for having the second highest) score in a game
